descriptions.name: mNormsFS53
descriptions.title: Normative morphometric data calculator for FreeSurfer 5.3 - Version 1.0
descriptions.disclaimer:
The authors take no responsibility for the use of this script or its derivatives. Not for diagnostic purposes.
The use of this script or its derivatives needs to be in agreement with the content of the following publications:
Potvin et al. (2017). Normative morphometric data for cerebral cortical areas over the lifetime of the adult human brain. NeuroImage, 156, 315-339. Potvin et al. (2017). FreeSurfer cortical normative data for adults using Desikan-Killiany-Tourville and Ex vivo protocols. NeuroImage, 156, 43-64. Potvin et al. (2016). Normative data for subcortical regional volumes over the lifetime of the adult human brain. NeuroImage, 137, 9-20.
descriptions.subjects_dir: The path to the directory containing all the FreeSurfer subjects folders.
descriptions.input_csv: CSV file containing subjects id (as in FreeSurfer’s subject directory), sex (M/F), age, manufacturer (GE/Philips/Siemens), and magnetic field strength (1.5/3). For an example, see "Example/intrant_example.csv"
descriptions.output_csv: Output path and CSV file name containing the normative values. If omitted, the file will be saved in current directory named "results"+"atlas"+"date"+"time".
descriptions.atlas: Choose between Desikan-Killiany (DK) or Desikan-Killiany-Tourville (DKT) atlases.

errors_warning.miss: Could not find the Input File. Please check the path.
errors_warning.notcsv: The Input file does not seem to be a CSV file.
errors_warning.notdir: The path for the subjects directory does not seem to be valid.
errors_warning.pascsv: The Output file (results) does not seem to be a CSV file. Default file in current directory will be save.
errors_warning.same: Warning! Found same structure with a different value.
errors_warning.id: Could not find an id column in your CSV file corresponding to each subject folder.
errors_warning.ids: Could not find an UNIQUE id column in your CSV file corresponding to each subject folder.
errors_warning.nofolder: Did not find any STATS folders.
errors_warning.wrongCSV: There is a problem with the necessary columns in the CSV. See Instructions.
errors_warning.query_yes_no: Do you want to replace the output csv file?
errors_warning.dont_replace: The results will be save in a default csv file.
errors_warning.output_invalid: The output suggested is not valid for a csv file. Default will be use.
